item.title: Today I'm a flag-waving, card-carrying Pom!
item.description: Just in time for Christmas - after 6 years of being harangued at Passport Control, questioned a million times and having to cough up around a Â£1000 a year for the past 3 years, I can now say I’m a whinging Pom.
